import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../App.css' import DataContext from '../Contexts/dataContext' import DataProvider from '../Providers/dataProvider' export default function () { return ( <>
handleHeight(e)} id="height" type="number" placeholder="50" />
handleWeight(e)} type="number" placeholder="160" />
{isWeightHeight.map((value) => (
{value.height}
{value.weight}
) )} ); }
